page.title: 12Caravan Sites in Ingleton
page.content: I interviewed Mrs Morphet. People all over the world come to this caravan site. There are 52 caravans on the site. Some of them are privately owned. If some one broke anything in the caravan they would pay for its replacement but if they didn't report it the thing they had broken would be insured.Mrs Morphet has been in charge for 15 years but the site has been in the family since the beginning. The caravan site is called Holme Head Caravan Site.There has been a new caravan this year and there are new replacements every year. If a caravan burst in flames it would burn in seconds. Garry and I interviewed a man called Mr Greenwood. He has a caravan site and behind his house he has some caravans for sale. He has fifteen caravans for sale altogether.
